programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull and Benny clash over the defense of a young man who helped his terminally ill girlfriend end her life.

programme.title: Bull

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team must find the person responsible for a sarin gas attack on a Los Angeles bus before a larger incident occurs.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team suspects a jilted unknown subject is responsible when brides are murdered on the eve of their nuptials.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When a robbery-homicide leaves three restaurant employees dead, a cold case that occurred in the same town six years earlier could yield a lead.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A murder in a Florida community of sex offenders results in a large number of possible suspects; a career opportunity could take Lewis away from the BAU.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: An unknown subject in Phoenix abducts people and deprives them of sleep; Garcia and Hotch deal with a threat from hit men.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU works with the NSA when two undercover DEA agents are murdered and another goes missing; Hotch hopes the team's work with the NSA will bring them closer to finding a ring of hit men.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The son of a retired FBI agent is kidnapped, and the team must investigate if it's an act of revenge; Isobel must make a hard call when information from the past comes to light.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When an attorney is found dead near the body of a private escort, the team must piece together what connected the two seemingly random victims; Jubal's connection with one of the victims makes finding the killer much more personal.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a truck filled with armor-piercing rifles is hijacked, the team works to discover who stole it, and what they have planned for the stolen weapons; a friend from OA's past returns to help with the case, but OA isn't sure he can trust him.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After the police ignore a desperate father's plea for help, he abducts a billionaire's daughter and holds her hostage in a safe room until his own missing child is returned to him; Jubal puts his hostage negotiation skills to the test.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When the team is called to the scene of a murder, it quickly suspects political motivation; Maggie contemplates a decision that could affect her entire career.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Jess LaCroix and his team come to help OA find a fugitive LaCroix arrested years ago after a bus with 26 students goes missing and he's the main suspect.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: The former secretary of an old friend, Simon, visits Mike Hammer with a theory about her old boss's sudden death. Mike chalks up her death to Simon's adventurous streak, until he shows up alive in his apartment. Simon reveals how he continued to play dead after a hired assassin took shots at him and two other hunting buddies. Looking for revenge, Simon talks Mike into helping him track down his assassin, and hunt that takes the private eye all the way to California. However, Mike soon after meets danger on this journey.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: After failing to save a tobacco company scientist scheduled to testify in court, Mike Hammer decides to quit smoking. However, a clean lifestyle becomes harder than he thought when he follows up on his client's murder. The dead scientist leaves behind questions about the killer's motives, his work at the company, and the tobacco industry at large. Of course, the nicotine withdrawals don't seem to help.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Mike Hammer becomes increasingly involved with the tobacco company and the family that owns it after he takes a job as their poster boy. The head of the company wishes to get to know Mike better and invited him to stay at their mansion. Some of the other family members hope that Mike's new status will prevent him from asking any more questions. But the death of Loolie leads to an investigation that Hammer just can't quit.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Mike Hammer is on the beat after the untimely death of former policeman Chic Farrell's death. After Mike finds Chic's son dead in a heroin house, the former cop is burning for revenge. Chic's own murder leaves Mike Hammer alone to find the killers, and the only witness is a strung out hooker who's on the run. The Russians and their steady supply of heroin to the city put them high up on Hammer's list of suspects.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Mike Hammer is hired to investigate a toxic chemical dump in the Hudson River by Patrick Dean, the man accused of the crime. Hammer is no fan of tabloids, but his sleuthing uncovers new headlines of his own. While looking to clear his name, the journalist who broke the story and incriminated Patrick is found dead. Now, Hammer starts to suspect that his client might not be as clean as he claimed to be.

programme.title: Acapulco H.E.A.T.
programme.desc: In the series opener, the crime-fighting Hemisphere Emergency Action Team H.E.A.T.) receives an assignment to provide security at a counterterrorism summit, but its efforts are jeopardized by the wife of a prince.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A desperate search begins when the team learns that one of their own is being targeted; Nate Getz tries to help Nell recover from her traumatic experience.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Granger try to clear Sam's name after he's arrested for a woman's murder; Kensi and Deeks find a link between the victim and Sam's past.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team suspects a terrorist group is responsible when a man is murdered by a small drone; Nell tries to avoid disaster in Long Beach.

programme.desc: Chief Boden makes a risky last minute decision to save his men; Dawson continues to deal with her father; Brett's childhood friend visits and strikes the attention of someone within the firehouse; a fire at a high school hits close to home for Boden.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: A camper gathering firewood in Arizona's scenic Sunset Crater National Park is shocked to discover the body of a young woman in a traditional long dress; her Mennonite family and friends are stunned.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: An exchange student finds a career and a love match in the idyllic Missouri university town of Columbia; it's a shock to her friends and family when she disappears, leaving both her child and cellphone behind.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: On a summer night, Amanda Colley returns to a ransacked house; her love interest Lamar and two girlfriends arrive to join her, and gunshots ring out; Amanda and her friend Lindy are found dead.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: In 1993, a newborn baby's body is discovered; the coroner determines the baby had been born alive; after 25 years, and with the assistance of modern DNA techniques, Gail Eastwood-Ritchey is found guilty of murder and sentenced to life in prison.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: Ten days after NBA player Lorenzen Wright goes missing, the player's body is found in a swamp, shot 11 times; police search for clues to identify who killed the basketball star.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: When Ohio State senior Reagan Tokes fails to respond to messages from her parents, they fear the worst; their nightmare becomes a reality when a caller reports the discovery of a female body in the local park; detectives race to solve the crime.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A deranged man terrorizes New York City in the late 1970s, leaving a trail of dead and wounded in his wake until a series of letters, a reluctant witness, and a parking ticket lead to his capture.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Police in rural Minnesota investigate the murder of a missing woman whose dead body is dumped next to an abandoned farmhouse.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A husband and wife are savagely attacked in their upstate New York home by an axe-wielding murderer; the wife survives, but loses her memory of the attack, so police must rely on the evidence.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer uses Louisiana's capital city as his private hunting ground, leaving a trail of dead women over a three-year span; cops struggle to stop him, until he leaves a survivor who picks him out of lineup and brings him to justice.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A soccer mom moonlighting as an escort disappears from Western Colorado, and it takes homicide detectives nearly seven years to unravel what proves to be a cold-blooded murder and a horrific cover up.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: It's the final session of this high stakes game in Vegas, and the last chance for the amateur ‘Loose Cannon’ to make a profit. Meanwhile, Hollywood actors Arden Cho and Jennifer Tilly play a hand worth $400,000.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: A fresh cast of characters take their seats in Las Vegas for a high stakes cash game, including poker pros Phil Laak and Maria Ho, actor-writer-comedian Michael Ian Black, and an amateur player – a new ‘Loose Cannon’ – looking to make more than just memories.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: Who is the real ‘Loose Cannon’? Lily Newhouse is the amateur who qualified to play in this high stakes cash game. But it’s Las Vegas businessman Dave Krosky who’s confusing pros like Sam Grafton with his unpredictable playing style.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: More high stakes action from Las Vegas. ‘Loose Cannon’ Lily Newhouse switches up her style, while local entrepreneur Dave Krosky sticks to his maverick methods. But have the pros finally started to figure him out?

programme.desc: More high stakes action from Las Vegas. ‘Loose Cannon’ Lily Newhouse switches up her style, while local entrepreneur Dave Krosky sticks to his maverick methods. But have the pros finally started to figure him out?

programme.title: Car Fix

programme.desc: Fred and Dave journey to New Mexico on the back of a Yamaha Wolverine UTV.

programme.desc: The M715 is in the shop to make it drivable, then it's off to the trail.

programme.desc: The guys see if tiny tires can handle the big rocks of Pritchett Canyon.

programme.desc: The Dirt-Heads are back on two wheels in their favorite town of Moab, Utah.

programme.desc: Fred and Dave pick up a real stinker of an icon, a Chevy K5 Blazer.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day

programme.desc: The guys turn a 4x4 van into a rock-crawling mountain bike shuttle bus.

programme.desc: The guys are on the hunt for Colorado's finest four-wheelin' trails.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian starts work on an all-aluminum Defender that has a Jeep JK chassis.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian installs more of the Defender's drivetrain, plus wheels and tires.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian creates his own short bed Jeep Gladiator by transforming a Jeep JK.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian modifies a 1998 Chevy T6500 for towing, overlanding and motorhoming.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian makes tons of custom parts to finish the All-Aluminum Defender project.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian gets a cheap Mercedes 300D ready for a local Gambler 500 rally.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Since the Bronco is back, Ian pays homage to the very cool box-style Bronco of the past. He helps with the handling by adding an upgraded suspension, and adds new bumpers for a more aggressive look. Plus, he fixes some gremlins in the inline-six mot.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: How a factory two-door Toyota Tacoma can be made into the perfect off-road truck with the right axles and suspension.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian continues the Tacoma project, but this time he completely reshapes the truck with a fiberglass body kit and truck cap, then cuts out the rear window to give it a vintage 4Runner look.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian takes the All-Aluminum Defender on the Kentucky Adventure Trail.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian turns a stack of tubes into a shorter trail chassis and adds new axles.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: The mock-up on the trail chassis continues as Ian adds a motor and transmission to the build; it's time to get axles underneath with a new third member so he can go four-wheel drive all the time.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian brings in a 1968 M715 to make it more reliable; he takes the body off the original chassis and stretches a Jeep JK chassis to make it fit; he adds upgraded suspension, 1-ton axles and an LS engine to make it a truck that can fight any battle.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Since a TJ can be had for under 10K, Ian shows how to buy a Jeep on a budget and outfit it with everything needed to hit the rocks and still have money left over.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: The Budget TJ gets some more parts; Ian updates the suspension with new coilovers; he adds new bumpers front and rear, and by the end of the day, this TJ is trail ready.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Since a TJ can be had for under 10K, Ian shows how to buy a Jeep on a budget and outfit it with everything needed to hit the rocks and still have money left over.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys convert their '72 Honda "Bozo" into a micro dirt-track ripper.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys uncover a cop car racing series around the Ford Crown Victoria P71 Police Interceptor; with a handful of bolt-on upgrades, they turn their former police auction find into a road race ripper around Willow Springs.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys take on off-road Baja legend Cameron Steele on a brutal desert off-road course with a Baja Bug; they may be outmatched by Cameron's unlimited racing rig, but the addition of a 350 V-8 to their Bug closes a big gap.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys give their Fiero-based kit car Scamborghini a 6-foot lift.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: Dave's '57 Bel Air gets a suspension overhaul in an event's parking lot.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys go all-out with suspension upgrades to the Baja-inspired Beetle.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten

programme.title: Everything I Never Expected
programme.desc: Opposites attract when a spoiled bachelor and a broke college grad accidentally become roommates. Forced to cohabitate in a less-than-ideal apartment, they clash, prank, and eventually fall for each other. Life challenges and misunderstandings complicate their budding romance, but true love prevails.

programme.title: Sleigh Queen
programme.desc: A woman has a Christmas wish: to reach another level as a stylist. But work and familial obligations make this challenging to achieve.

programme.title: Naughty or Nice
programme.desc: Melody, an exotic dancer, and her doctor boyfriend, Patrick, prepare to spend the holidays with Patrick's family. When they arrive, they are met by Patrick's overprotective judgmental mother, and she unleashes her wrath on Melody, as she's not good enough for her son.

programme.title: Christmas With da Fam
programme.desc: After Malcom proposes to Serenity, she takes him home to meet her family for the holidays. The spirit is alive, until they discover that Serenity's ex Denzel is living with her family after a house fire. A rivalry develops between Malcolm and Denzel that ends up in a hilarious battle of wits over the holiday weekend.

programme.title: Mixed Christmas
programme.desc: Aurora wants to enjoy the holidays this year in some warmth and sunshine, and invites her three best friends to Miami for a Christmas trip to remember. When they arrive at their AirBnb, they discover it's been double booked by Aurora's ex-girlfriend and her new partner Axel. They have no choice but to combine their plans, and celebrate the holiday together.

programme.title: What a Day Before Christmas
programme.desc: Nathan and Naomi are at odds about the direction of their marriage, and reluctance to get in the Christmas Spirit is shown by Nathan. As an ultimatum, it is insisted by Naomi that the holidays are spent by Nathan with her and her family, but it is Christmas Eve. The help of Nathan's cousin Keith is enlisted, and a road trip is embarked upon by the two as they race against time. An attempt is made to get home for the holidays and save the marriage.

programme.title: Glistening in the Snow
programme.desc: When struggling club owner Anaja finds out that her co-owner, Donovan, is coming to town for the holiday, she expects him to help keep the doors open. However, his fiancé Addie wants him to sell the club. When the owners and staff are trapped in the club during a snow storm, they will have to work together to resolve their issues with each other.

programme.title: Mother of a Christmas
programme.desc: Ben and his family plan a family vacation to the beach, including his mother-in-law. When his wife and children experience delays at the airport, he has an unforgettable experience being trapped in a house wit his mother-in-law.

programme.title: A Very Merry New Year
programme.desc: A Fortune 500 CEO decides to gather her best high school friends for a New Year's Eve reunion celebration that winds up exposing long-hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Green Grass
programme.desc: When a man’s money, success and power attracts attention, he must dig deep within himself to stop his life from spinning wildly out of control.

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student 2:The Hunt
programme.desc: Mr. and Mrs. Nelson are excited to be getting two new foreign exchange students to live with them. Then, a chain of murders starts to happen again in the city of Houston. They suspect the murders may be connected to Sinclair's death.

programme.title: The Exit Row
programme.desc: Sasha Dade is dedicated to her demanding, yet comfortable, life as a wife, mother and advertising executive near the nation's capital. Clint Meyers is a top-selling real estate agent and investor who projects sensitivity, but harbors a dark side. Their worlds collide when a chance encounter on a traumatic flight leads to a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Ebony Hustle 2: Ballistic Protection

programme.desc: The Pulse with Bill Anderson is a weekly tv program and podcast featuring topical discussions and interviews surrounding current local issues, events, and entertainment. Each week Bill will welcome guests from all walks of life to talk about the topics that have the attention of our community and beyond. The Pulse will air weekly on FOX 29 in Philly as well as FOX Soul nationwide and be distributed on all major podcast outlets. In addition to hosting The Pulse Bill also manages the content of the station's special reports, including the Our Race Reality series of segments and specials. programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The week's final visit is to Adhurst Yurts in Hampshire, where owner Alison Lubbock is on a mission to educate her guests to think green, but they question the provenance of her produce.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Tensions boil over as the group come face to face, before the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts in Sancton, Yorkshire and The North Star Club, owned by Carolyn Van Outersterp and daughter Galatea who hope their peaceful woodland cabins will win over the guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Friends Bed and Breakfast in Blackpool, Lancashire run by Luke and John Conway, who are the self-proclaimed unique selling point. But feedback from some leaves a bitter taste.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit of the week the group head to The Lincoln Holiday Retreat, which owner Debbie Grant has built from the ground up over the past twenty years. However, some of the guests think the décor is too dated.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The Chapel in Harrogate, North Yorkshire, owned by Mark Hinchcliffe and Heidi Donohoe, who pride themselves on offering something special in their converted chapel.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Tensions boil over as the group come face to face, before the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Heather and Sally hope their fussy cleaning regime will impress their rivals at Brockley Hall Hotel in Yorkshire. But there are problems in some rooms, and the breakfast puzzles the guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Alistair, who has fitted out luxury hotels including The Savoy, welcomes his rivals to his refurbished village pub, The Star Inn 1744, where his breakfast ordering system raises questions.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Steve and Tracy welcome their rivals to their bed and breakfast Harbour Vista in Poole, and most of their guests are surprised that it's not more lavish, when they realise they are staying in Steve's house.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Dawlish in Devon, where owner of The Knitting Hotel Belinda Harris-Reid and colleague Brenda Watson are hoping their guests get excited about all things woolly.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit of the week the group head to Stade Court Hotel in Hythe in Kent, where the owners, Sandeep and Vaishalee Chawla, have a hosting policy of treating their guests like a god.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mandy McCready and her assistant Sam Gould welcome their rivals to the Goodlife Guest House, a family business in Harwich in Essex.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Ronnie and Steph Caird welcome their rivals to Inn at the Park in Aberdeen. where it is all about keeping it in the family. But one guest's culinary background piles on the pressure for Ronnie at breakfast.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Shauna and Fiona welcome their rivals to Ingliston Country Club in Renfrewshire. But Steve and Allard think the décor is dated, and a breakfast waiting game causes a storm in a teacup.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Steve and Allard welcome their rivals to 1692 Wasdale in the Lake District. Fiona and Shauna think it's picture perfect, but other guests face tricky technology and cleanliness concerns.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The last visit of the week is to Blackpool and confident John welcomes his rivals to the Lynbar Hotel. He says his breakfast is the best in Blackpool and hopes his guests will agree.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Tensions boil over as the group come face to face, before the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts in Pencader, Wales and the School House bed and breakfast, owned by eco-friendly couple Jayne and Ian, where they hope their environmental approach will win over their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Cathedral 73 in Cardiff, managed by Neil Chidzey and Assistant Manager Jo Goodwin. Guests are wowed by the glamorous rooms, but the costs prove hard to swallow.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit of the week the group head to Leafy Suburban bed and breakfast in Northwood, where golfer Raj Kumar opens the doors to his home. However, Neil and Jo are not impressed with a surprise visitor.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The Wellington Inn in Hertfordshire where resources manager Felicity Rainbow takes a spiritual approach to hosting - but the `Welly' twist is not a hit with everyone.

programme.desc: Tensions boil over as the group come face to face, before the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the competition is to The Helix Hotel in Grangemouth, Stirlingshire, where host Nawaz Haq wants to show off his hotel, catering to the travelling businessman. Come morning, the group raises concerns over the breakfast banquet.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Black Boy Hotel in Sudbury, where hosts Kate Martin and sister Marie Carlton want their guests to kick back and embrace the historical surroundings.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The fourth visit is to The Lodge Bed and Breakfast in Cannock, Staffordshire, where hosts Lee and Marie Garnett are hoping their guests take to their homely BandB, but have they done enough to win?

programme.desc: Tensions boil over as the group come face to face, before the winner is revealed.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Tensions are simmering as the guests head to The White House in Brighton.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: 1 vs. 100
programme.desc: Professional dancer Carrie Ann Inaba hosts this show in which a contestant can win $50,000. The contestant, known as the One, competes with a mob of 100 other players by answering questions. When the One answers correctly, each member of the mob that answered incorrectly is eliminated. The One earns money for each mob member who is eliminated. If the One can eliminate the entire mob, he wins $50,000. But if the One gets a question wrong, he is eliminated and the remaining mob members split his winnings.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia
programme.desc: Fashion comes to Wipeout Australia as we meet Adam “God’s Gift” Marshall, a self styled Ad man who conquers the Qualifier. Other Catwalk moments include the Grandpa in his Red Speedos and a Rainbow Bright Personal Ad. If jumping a revolving arm while balancing on a pedestal above water isn’t enough for you then you’ll love this weeks Sweeper. Contestants are armed with Dodgeballs, to be deployed at each other, creating horrific hits and spectacular spills. The Dizzy Dummy claims its first victim as Dummy Tummy rejects a contestant and the Wipeout Zone becomes a battle of young and old.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia
programme.desc: It’s no doubt that the ‘Ball Crusher’ Sweeper is the star of tonight’s show. With a brother- sister team hanging by a thread and a three-way hurdle, this week’s Sweeper writes itself into the History books. Tonight is also the night we meet Buffman, a pint sized Superhero with a twitch and a photo finish at the Dizzy Dummy threatens extinction to a Rare Breed. A week of action packed Wipeouts with Latin Dancing lotharios, what more can you ask for? And for the kids, a Fairy Tale, Wipeout Style!

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today it's the Scottish chefs' last chance to impress, with the dessert course. Only two can cook for the judges tomorrow, and with one chef in the lead after a triumphant main, the pressures on for the other two to plate up perfection.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three of the south west's finest chefs - Jude Kereama, Josh Eggleton and Dominic Chapman - attempt to impress a veteran judge with their starters. As the only newcomer in the kitchen, Jude is determined to plate up a winning dish.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three south west chefs fight it out for the fish course. Despite schoolboy errors during the starter, experienced Dominic is determined to get a high score on the course. But will newcomer Jude, a seafood master, overcome his nerves to plate up?.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: With a refined summer barbecue going up against a traditional Cornish speciality and a historic Wimbledon related recipe, who will come out on top? Andy Clatworthy is using his passion for historical cooking to reinvent a dish.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The south-west chefs have one last chance to impress as they face the dessert course. Only two chefs can go through to cook for the judges; with everything to play for, who will plate up perfection and who will be sent packing?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two remaining south-west judges must cook their entire menus again for judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. Joining the judges is Radhika Bynon, a member of the Forest Gate Women's Institute, a modern urban group of women.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael are challenged to plate up perfect starter courses for this week's veteran judge. It's the first time in the Great British Menu kitchen for all three chefs, so who will triumph and who will fall?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael fight it out for the fish course. Experimental chef Stephen is determined to prove himself with a fish course honouring the WI's tradition of preserving, but he's up against stiff competition.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It's a battle for the main course with the Welsh chefs going head to head. With all three chefs paying homage to Welsh lamb; Adam with a refined dish, Phil with a dish dedicated to his Mum and Stephen with a lamb dish celebrating the WI.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It's the tricky dessert course and the last chance for the Welsh chefs to secure their place in tomorrow's regional final. With everything to play for, the pressure is fierce. Only two can make it through, and one will leave the competition for good.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Two remaining Welsh chefs cook their four courses again for the judges and Rosemary Bishton. One chef will be chosen to represent Wales in the National Finals taking them a step closer to cooking at the banquet.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Chris McGowan, Danni Barry and Ben Arnold are cooking their fish courses. Ambitious Ben is determined to steal Chris's regional crown, but under fierce scrutiny from this week's formidable veteran, will the pressure to deliver spell melt down?

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Representing the North West are Eve Townson, Matt Worswick and returning contender Mark Ellis. Today's the starter course, and after failing to cook for the judges last year Mark's out to redeem himself but he faces stiff competition in executive chef Eve and young gun Matt.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Monty Don's Paradise Gardens
programme.desc: In Turkey Monty is dazzled by an extraordinary display of the Ottoman Empire's favourite flower, the tulip, and learns of its sacred significance. Travelling further East to India he encounters a new type of spirituality in the tomb gardens of the Mughal Empire. Stunning mausoleums were set in vast gardens as places where an earthly king could enter a divine paradise.

programme.title: Monty Don's Paradise Gardens
programme.desc: In Turkey Monty is dazzled by an extraordinary display of the Ottoman Empire's favourite flower, the tulip, and learns of its sacred significance. Travelling further East to India he encounters a new type of spirituality in the tomb gardens of the Mughal Empire. Stunning mausoleums were set in vast gardens as places where an earthly king could enter a divine paradise.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty assesses the progress, successes and failures of his paradise garden. Elsewhere, Frances Tophill travels to Glasgow to meet a gardener whose hands-off approach to his garden has reaped rewards for wildlife.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty assesses the progress, successes and failures of his paradise garden. Elsewhere, Frances Tophill travels to Glasgow to meet a gardener whose hands-off approach to his garden has reaped rewards for wildlife.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don visits some of the most famous and interesting gardens in France. Here, he tells the stories behind France's important historic gardens. These include elaborate walled gardens designed to please the mistress - and then the wife - of a King, and magnificent displays of flowers and fountains that involved thousands of soldiers moving tracts of land and incited violent jealousy in another monarch.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don turns to the French love of food and finds out how this has influenced their gardens. He travels to some of the most famous `potager' or kitchen gardens, where vegetables and flowers are planted together in elaborate and beautiful displays. He also talks to gardeners about this style of planting which has been copied the world over.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don visits some of the most famous and interesting gardens in France. Here, he tells the stories behind France's important historic gardens. These include elaborate walled gardens designed to please the mistress - and then the wife - of a King, and magnificent displays of flowers and fountains that involved thousands of soldiers moving tracts of land and incited violent jealousy in another monarch.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don turns to the French love of food and finds out how this has influenced their gardens. He travels to some of the most famous `potager' or kitchen gardens, where vegetables and flowers are planted together in elaborate and beautiful displays. He also talks to gardeners about this style of planting which has been copied the world over.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don travels to some of the most celebrated artists' gardens, including the one created by the impressionist Claude Monet, who planted and painted his garden for half his life. Monty also matches the paintings to the garden of Paul Cezanne, as well as visiting several contemporary artistic gardens to see how the use of plants and trees has evolved into new and varied styles.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don continues his grand garden tour of Italy. This time he is in Naples to visit some of the most sublime, romantic retreats in southern Italy. After all the formality of the green gardens around Rome and Florence, Monty seeks out idyllic horticultural gems set against the dramatic scenery of the Amalfi Coast to discover why, in the south, gardens are informal and, above all, filled with flowers.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don concludes his garden tour of Italy in the wealthy north where, in the Veneto and Lucca, extravagant pleasure gardens were created for flirtation and fun. In the Lakes, Monty meets up with the garden society, the Grandi Giardini Italiani, to peer over the fence at luxurious creations of the rich and famous. The journey ends on Lake Maggiore to see the most theatrical horticultural gem of Italy.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty travels to Europe and explores the influence of the Venetians on gardening. To begin with, he explores Venice on one of the city's famous barges, stepping out to visit green spaces large and small that are often hidden from view behind high walls.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins in the city of Trieste, close to Italy's border with Croatia, to visit a public garden first created by an obsessive royal plantsman more than 150 years ago, which is now being carefully restored. He then heads down the Adriatic coast through Croatia to pick up the trail that the Venetians followed, ending his journey on the beautiful island of Lopud, near Dubrovnik.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins the last leg of his journey in Corfu, a Greek island with strong Venetian links, including olive trees planted by them that are still grown today. Here, Monty visits a spectacular garden made by an Englishman with Greek connections.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty visits influential gardens of the 19th Century, from royal retreats to the very first public parks.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty concludes his journey by looking at how the nation’s gardens have evolved over the last hundred years.

programme.title: AFTCO Original Film
programme.desc: Last August, we partnered with Capt. Moe Newman of Journey South Outfitters to host the AFTCO Women’s Fish Camp in Venice, LA. Nine female ambassadors from various states joined to test our spring women's fishing line, representing both saltwater and freshwater perspectives. The experience shaped the final offerings for this spring and future line plans for our women's fishing clothing.

programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a “Tensas Limit” of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: With the drought ending and rain headed their way, the crew hunts the final days of the first split in Bayou Black with new friends Jesse Griffiths and Dirk Sorrells.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The second split is here, and the crew decides to try their luck at historic Old Hickory in Lacour, Louisiana. Ducks, deer, and mouth-watering meals are all on the menu.

programme.title: AFTCO Original Film
programme.desc: Last August, we partnered with Capt. Moe Newman of Journey South Outfitters to host the AFTCO Women’s Fish Camp in Venice, LA. Nine female ambassadors from various states joined to test our spring women's fishing line, representing both saltwater and freshwater perspectives. The experience shaped the final offerings for this spring and future line plans for our women's fishing clothing.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Mike heads to Table Rock Lake to meet up with Trenton and his family. Even battling the tough fishing conditions following a heavy front, there’s never a lack of family time, laughs or friendly competitions with the Southards.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton is headed to meet up with Andrew Norbye on Lake Guntersville in Alabama. With not a lot of current being pulled, the deep schools weren’t set up to feed. So they went up shallow to fish grass until evening time when the ledge fish really started biting.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Rex meets up with “Mr Crappie” Wally Marshall in Texas. Wally takes Rex to one of his secret spots to put the hammer on the crappie. Not only did they catch crappie, but nice largemouth and some top tier coppernose bluegill.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew heads to Rivers Lodge and Hunt Club in Kansas to fish strip pits. Trenton and Rex take on Mike and Nate in a 3 period mini tournament. With multiple species allowed including northern pike, the two teams are neck and neck after the first two periods. Due to bad weather on day 2, period 3 turned into a hour speed round where only keeper largemouth count.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. Mike teaches the guys about the local waters including pogey boats and most importantly, world class red fish.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton goes down North Carolina to learn the family secrets of the Forehand family. Ben Forehand is a guitarist for Christian Contemporary artist Pat Barret. When Ben isn’t playing guitar, he runs Wild and Free Outfitters getting people into the outdoors hunting and fishing, getting their minds off of the everyday grind. . Even though fishing is tough the guys build strong friendships and lasting memories.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton stays close to home and heads to the Lake of The Ozarks joining Austin Culbertson for a frigid couple days of fishing. The cold weather doesn’t hold back the fish, though, as they target brush piles with jerk baits and umbrella rigs.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton and Trevor pack up and drive down to Arkansas for their first experience on the White River. The brothers spend a day in the boat with Bryant Stark of Rising Rivers, fishing the White and the Norfork. Though the White is much larger waters than back home, Trevor utilizes his experience to catch them even while wading.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton makes a trip to South Carolina to fish Lake Murray. He meets up with the Rather Outdoors crew to spend time on the water and at the Rather HQ checking out all the gear from Lews and Strike King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew is chasing Tarpon in Tampa Florida with Ryan Harrington. After a few close calls and grinding out the long days, they finally catch up to the Silver King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Southards continue their family tradition on Table Rock Lake. While they’re there, Trenton spends a day with “Mr. Worldwide” James Watson and learns some things from one of the best anglers on the lake.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: With a free day before Icast. Trenton and Ryan go offshore to try and fill the cooler. Catching a variety of species and hoping to get their hands on a hogfish.

programme.desc: Brian is Joined by Ryan Harder from Zman on an epic 70-mile inshore fishing journey in the Lowcountry, aiming for the coveted inshore slam.

programme.desc: Brian heads to Tuskegee, Alabama to night-fish the home waters of the one and only Mark Daniels Junior.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing

programme.desc: A Southwest Mississippi GIANT “Barry” has made more daylight appearances than possibly any mature bucks in existence. Now that Slade is back from the midwest The chase is on.

programme.title: All Is Lost

programme.title: Semper Fi

programme.title: Braven
programme.desc: A quiet weekend turns into a battle for survival when a logger and his family run into drug traffickers who’ve hidden cocaine in their hunting cabin.

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-convict fights to protect his estranged daughter from her drug-dealer boyfriend and the cartel that is hunting her down.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: A thrill-ride about what one American family must do to survive when a violent coup overtakes Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Semper Fi

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: A thrill-ride about what one American family must do to survive when a violent coup overtakes Southeast Asia.

programme.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
programme.desc: After delivering components for the atom bombs that would be dropped on Japan, the USS Indianapolis goes down in the shark-infested Philippine Sea.

programme.title: Wolf Hound
programme.desc: A U.S. pilot shot down over Germany must singlehandedly battle Nazi troops to thwart a doomsday plot.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones is General Douglas MacArthur, who tasks one of his men with deciding if Emperor Hirohito should be hanged as a war criminal.

programme.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
programme.desc: After delivering components for the atom bombs that would be dropped on Japan, the USS Indianapolis goes down in the shark-infested Philippine Sea.

programme.title: Lord Of War
programme.desc: A notorious arms dealer sells weapons to dictators and successfully outruns the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: An assassin lands in Bangkok on business but finds himself unexpectedly training a young protégé and falling for a woman unaware of his true nature.

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Without any special powers or training, high school nerd Dave decides to take his love of comic books to a new level and become a vigilante superhero.

programme.title: Surf Ninjas
programme.desc: Two surfer dudes discover they are princes of a small South Pacific island and are destined to save their native land from a cruel despot.

programme.title: Suburban Commando
programme.desc: Forced to take a vacation in a quiet American suburb, an intergalactic warrior must protect his new human friends when bounty hunters track him down.

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn and Burt Reynolds star as two screenwriters who face chaos after meeting each other's families.

programme.title: Disorderlies
programme.desc: Three friends must save a wealthy, ailing curmudgeon from the morbid plans of the man's greedy nephew.

programme.title: Hot to Trot
programme.desc: A hapless stockbroker meets a talking horse, and everything changes.

programme.title: Osmosis Jones
programme.desc: Inside the body of a zoo worker, a white-blood-cell cop and a cold tablet join forces to stop a virulent virus that’s intent on taking over The City.

programme.title: Strange Brew
programme.desc: When a deranged Brewmeister plans to turn beer into a mind-control device, two friends must save the world.

programme.title: True Stories
programme.desc: David Byrne whimsically pays homage to the mythical small Texas town of Virgil.

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Six young urbanites with budding careers and restless hearts share their dreams, their music, and the common courtyard between their apartments.

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Neurotic conman Roy and his protégé Frank find their latest scam disrupted when Roy discovers he has a teen daughter who wants to meet him.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: During World War II, a young Scottish woman travels to London, then gets involved with the French Resistance while trying to rescue her missing lover.

programme.title: Chaos Theory
programme.desc: An obsessively organized man learns that he’s sterile … and that his daughter was fathered by his best friend.

programme.title: Beyond The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: Two rival salvage teams race through a capsized luxury liner to claim a secret fortune aboard the ship.

programme.title: Corrina, Corrina
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg and Ray Liotta star in the story of a maid in 1959 whose care for a widower and his daughter leads to racial backlash of their love.

programme.title: Critters
programme.desc: After escaping from a maximum-security prison asteroid, a band of extraterrestrial flesh-eating criminals unwittingly land on planet Earth.

programme.title: Critters 2: The Main Course
programme.desc: When two men find a bunch of exotic eggs, the critters soon hatch and unleash a hungry horde of ugly little monsters on their small Kansas town.

programme.title: Critters 3
programme.desc: Let round three begin in the battle for the planet! The flesh-eating alien fuzzballs return to try a whole new fare: city dwellers.

programme.title: Critters 4
programme.desc: This futuristic tale finds spacecraft crew members dealing with an infestation of furry, flesh-eating creatures let loose aboard their ship.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons
programme.desc: When the evil returns years later to avenge what transpired in Izmer, five adventurers and thieves must thwart the traps, ghouls and armies of hell.

programme.title: Annie: A Royal Adventure
programme.desc: Annie and her pals go to London with Daddy Warbucks, where they must stop an evil noblewoman's plot to blow up Buckingham Palace.

programme.title: Taking 5
programme.desc: Two nerdy teens fan-out to the extreme and plot to kidnap the world’s most famous boy band to make them play at their school and make them popular.

programme.title: Lost in Yonkers
programme.desc: A film adaptation of Neil Simon's Pulitzer Prize-winning comedy/drama that follows the escapades and tragedies of an unusual family in 1942 Yonkers.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Based on the book The Three Stooges: From Amalgamated Morons to American Icons, this MOW dramatizes the rise of the comedy trio to worldwide fame.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Boxer Cassius Clay (Muhammad Ali) trains with Angelo Dundee (Ernest Borgnine), becomes heavyweight champion and converts to Islam.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend
programme.desc: Following the expansion of the United States into the Southwest, the Apache Indians are forced onto a reservation to live out their lives as lowly corn farmers. While many resign themselves to this fate, several Apache, including Geronimo (Wes Studi), refuse to go quietly. Hoping to quell a major rebellion, General Charles Crook (Gene Hackman) dispatches over 5,000 U.S. Cavalry soldiers, led by Lieutenant Charles Gatewood (Jason Patric), to hunt down Geronimo and his men.

programme.title: Silverado
programme.desc: In the 1800s Old West, an unlikely band of misfit friends teams up in a shoot-em-up against a frontier town’s crooked sheriff and his henchmen.

programme.title: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A stubborn rancher in his twilight years takes on the U.S. government when the Air Force tries to expropriate his New Mexico land for a missile range.

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: A tech geek expelled from school for pulling pranks on staff becomes the one person with enough savvy to rescue students from a gang of kidnappers.

programme.title: Christmas on Division Street
programme.desc: Follows the unlikely friendship between a bullied teenage school boy and the unhomed American history buff he wants to help before Christmas.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: An author discovers fame when his book skyrockets to the bestseller list. He then gets a visit from a stranger telling him he has 40 days to live.

programme.title: The Nuttiest Nutcracker
programme.desc: Young teen Marie falls asleep and enters the magical world of the Nutcracker Prince where, along with some friends, she helps him reclaim his kingdom.

programme.title: Buster & Chauncey's Silent Night
programme.desc: Two 19th-century Austrian mice evade a voracious cat, aid a kidnapped orphan, foil thieves and help create a holiday classic.

programme.title: The 12 Dogs of Christmas
programme.desc: During the Great Depression in a town that has outlawed dogs, a preteen girl puts on a canine-themed Christmas pageant to win over the mayor.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: An author discovers fame when his book skyrockets to the bestseller list. He then gets a visit from a stranger telling him he has 40 days to live.

programme.title: Christmas on Division Street
programme.desc: Follows the unlikely friendship between a bullied teenage school boy and the unhomed American history buff he wants to help before Christmas.

programme.title: Silverado
programme.desc: In the 1800s Old West, an unlikely band of misfit friends teams up in a shoot-em-up against a frontier town’s crooked sheriff and his henchmen.

programme.title: Criminals of the Air
programme.desc: An undercover agent is sent to a border town to break up a well-organized band of smugglers.

programme.title: Diamond Head
programme.desc: A wealthy Hawaiian pineapple plantation owner and bigoted bully with political ambitions flatly refuses to allow his young sister to marry a native.

programme.title: What a Woman!
programme.desc: An author (Willard Parker) and a literary agent (Rosalind Russell) become involved after selling film rights to his racy book.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: An English couple in Kenya raises an orphaned lion cub to adulthood. When a warden demands she be sent to a zoo, they train her to live in the wild.

programme.title: You Belong to Me
programme.desc: Rich playboy Peter Kirk (Henry Fonda) crashes into Dr. Helen Hunt (Barbara Stanwyck) on a ski slope and overplays his injuries so she will continue her medical attention. He declares his love, and, although Helen insists that her career will always come first, the two get married. Soon, Peter is consumed by jealous suspicions of his wife's male patients and embarrasses Helen several times. Fearful of driving her away, Peter launches into character-changing behavior to prove his love.

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: A butler becomes a king after a shipwreck.

programme.title: Baby the Rain Must Fall
programme.desc: After his release from prison, an aspiring country singer tries to go straight, but his dream of a singing career puts this plan in danger.

programme.title: Brief Moment
programme.desc: Based on a play by S.N. Behrman.

programme.title: Passport to Suez
programme.desc: Master sleuth Lone Wolf (Warren William) outwits Nazi spies for canal plans in Egypt.

programme.title: No Sad Songs for Me
programme.desc: Upon being diagnosed with terminal cancer, selfless suburban housewife Mary Scott (Margaret Sullavan) makes the ultimate sacrifice: she decides to keep the unpleasant news from her husband, Brad (Wendell Corey), and daughter, Polly, to avoid devastating her loved ones. Instead, Mary encourages Brad's affair with a co-worker (Viveca Lindfors), and even grooms the other woman to take her place. But as Mary's illness progresses, keeping it a secret presents a considerable challenge.

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Academy Award winner for Best Picture tells the story of an idealistic Southern politician brought down by his own ambition and lust for power.

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: Convinced they’re the first men on the moon, three astronauts discover evidence of a lunar landing decades earlier and track down its sole survivor.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Reporter Ben Munceford (Sidney Poitier) is aboard a U.S. Navy ship sailing near the Arctic Circle, on assignment to write a profile of Capt. Eric Finlander (Richard Widmark), a hardened anti-communist. Despite the concerns of Munceford, medical officer Chester Potter (Martin Balsam) and others on the ship, Finlander is shadowing a Soviet submarine on patrol in the same area, hoping to make it to surface. The cat-and-mouse game, however, turns deadly serious.

programme.title: There's That Woman Again
programme.desc: A district-attorney employee worries about his wife's activities as an amateur sleuth.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: This steamy pot-boiler follows the intrigues surrounding an escaped convict who attempts to return to the small southern town where he grew up.

programme.title: The Mating of Millie
programme.desc: A businesswoman (Evelyn Keyes) asks a bachelor (Glenn Ford) to help her find a husband so she can adopt an orphan.

programme.title: How to Save a Marriage and Ruin Your Life
programme.desc: A dedicated bachelor takes it upon himself to save his best friend’s marriage by seducing his mistress, only to wind up in his own romantic conundrum.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pierre Bouelle novel about POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American officers plot to blow up the structure, but the commander of the bridge's construction has different plans.

programme.title: A Time for Killing
programme.desc: After Capt. Dorrit Bentley (George Hamilton) and his fellow Confederate troops escape from a Union prison, Maj. Wolcott (Glenn Ford) sets out to recapture the fugitives. As protection, the Southern escapees abduct Wolcott's lovely fiancée, Emily Biddle (Inger Stevens), and head toward Mexico. On their way to the border, they kill a Northern messenger bearing word that the Civil War is over and keep this information to themselves, resulting in more conflict with Union soldiers.

programme.title: The New Daughters of Joshua Cabe
programme.desc: While posing as his daughters, three women discover an elderly homesteader has been falsely imprisoned for murder and hatch a plot to smuggle him out.

programme.title: Utah Blaine
programme.desc: A gunfighter helps a ranch owner in his attempt to prevent a renegade crew from taking over the territory.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small western community turn on Jim Guthrie (Dana Andrews) when he becomes the prime suspect for a murder he didn't commit. Before getting a chance to prove his innocence, Jim is driven from his home and into the wilderness, where he is left for dead. Despite the danger, he comes back years later, discovering that he's still a wanted man. But a kindhearted local named Chris (Dianne Foster) believes his story, and together they begin a desperate search for the true culprit.

programme.title: J.W. Coop
programme.desc: After spending a decade behind bars for writing bad checks and punching a cop, former rodeo star J.W. Coop (Cliff Robertson) re-enters a world drastically different from how he left it; the only constant seems to be his mother (Geraldine Page). Gradually coming to terms with societal changes and cultural norms, Coop is determined to climb back to the top spot on the rodeo circuit. Along the way, he hooks up with Bean (Cristina Ferrare), a liberated woman who helps him catch up to modern life.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: An Arizona land-grabber (Telly Savalas) and his brother (George Maharis) renew their feud amid Army troops and Apaches.

programme.title: Jack McCall, Desperado
programme.desc: A lone gunslinger, Jack McCall (George Montgomery), bursts into a saloon and shoots dead the legendary Wild Bill Hickok (Douglas Kennedy). Arrested and put on trial, McCall recounts a twisted tale that paints Hickok as anything but heroic, explaining how Hickok and McCall's cousin Bat (James Seay) took over McCall's family's plantation, killed his parents and even framed him for crimes he didn't commit. McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

programme.title: Hands Across the Rockies
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok and his sidekick Cannonball meet a woman who is scheduled to marry the murderer they are trailing.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: Two ex-Quantrill's raiders (Audie Murphy, Ben Cooper) join the Arizona Rangers to hunt raiders still at large.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: After fleeing a sheriff's escort to jail, an outlaw thief crosses paths with a mysterious stranger and a greedy rancher en route to his stash of gold.

programme.title: Up the MacGregors
programme.desc: Gregor MacGregor (David Bailey) is celebrating his upcoming marriage to Rosita Carson (Agata Flori) when bandits, led by the evil Maldonado (Leo Anchóriz), steal the family fortune. Determined to get their money back, Gregor and his six brothers go after the robbers. They run across a dentist and his beautiful daughter, who help them find the gang's hideout and retrieve their cash -- but then Maldonado takes Rosita hostage in retaliation. When Gregor comes to save her, he is also captured.

programme.title: Return of the Durango Kid
programme.desc: A stagecoach passenger poses as a masked avenger to track down the thieves who robbed him and his companions.

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
programme.desc: Texan and U.S. Cavalryman Lt. Frank Hewitt (Audie Murphy) deserts the army after Colorado Union soldiers carry out the deadly Sand Creek reservation massacre, fearing reprisal from the Cheyenne. Crossing into Texas, Franks finds himself labeled a traitor for fighting with the Yankees, and his warnings about possible Indian revenge go unheeded. When a town near a mission, populated mostly by women, is attacked, Frank is appointed their protector and must build an army comprised of townswomen.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: Former Union soldier John Parrish (Glenn Ford) wants to sell his ranch and start a new life by settling down out east. However, the ruthless tactics of Lew Wilkison (Edward G. Robinson), the scheming businessman interested in his property, make Parrish reconsider the move, especially after one of his ranch hands is murdered. Adding to the increasingly tense conflict is Wilkison's wife, Martha (Barbara Stanwyck), who is cheating on her husband with his brother, Cole (Brian Keith).

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A framed Texas rancher (Robert Knapp) escapes from prison for a showdown with a saloonkeeper (Walter Coy).

programme.title: Riders of the Northwest Mounted
programme.desc: A Mountie (Russell Hayden) and his partner (Dub Taylor) set out on a manhunt.

programme.title: The Stranger Wore a Gun
programme.desc: After the Civil War, a spy for the Confederacy absconds to Arizona to start a new life but gets reluctantly pulled into a stagecoach gold robbery.

programme.title: Legend of the Golden Gun
programme.desc: After his family is killed, a quiet, young farmer turns into a deadly gunfighter, dedicating his life to the pursuit of evildoers.

programme.title: Oklahoma Crude
programme.desc: An oil derrick owner in early 1900s Oklahoma, along with her father and a bum, tries her best to keep oil companies from buying her estate.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: Podcaster Elise partners with Daniyal to create an unforgettable Christmas, but it seems he's wooing the wrong woman amidst the festive chaos.

programme.title: A Royal In Paradise
programme.desc: A successful romance writer and a Prince individually escape to a tropical island only to find each other…and true love.

programme.title: The Secrets of Comfort House
programme.desc: A multiple murder investigation in a small hunting town focuses on one suspect, Wendy Sinclair, who operates a battered women's shelter where each of the victims' wives have sought shelter.

programme.title: A Slice of Romance
programme.desc: When a vice president at a PR firm makes a deal with a coffee shop owner, she ends up getting more out of it than she had initially imagined.

programme.title: A Royal Recipe for Love
programme.desc: When Emma is hired to bake for a royal cake, she finds herself at odds with a Prince.

programme.title: A Mile In His Shoes
programme.desc: Baseball coach Murph needs a miracle to save the team. Pitcher Micky with Aspergers may be the answer.

programme.title: Ivy & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A young woman is determined to get home for Christmas, but gets stranded in a small town during a snow storm. Little does she know that she is exactly where she is supposed to be.

programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: TV host Heather tries to make the perfect Christmas episode but clashes with the winery owner.

programme.title: Waking Up to Christmas
programme.desc: After being zapped by faulty Christmas lights, a workaholic finds herself the lead in an over-the-top Hallmark-style holiday movie.

programme.title: Deck The Heart
programme.desc: When an EVP inherits a manor, he's expected to host his family for Christmas.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Santa's Castle
programme.desc: Based on L. Frank Baum's Christmas tales, this story follows the kidnapping of Santa Claus on Christmas Eve by a group of creatures set on sabotaging Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: A heartwarming tale of friendship and love as single mom Maggie adopts a Labrador for her son Ethan.

programme.title: A Christmas Truce
programme.desc: An American soldier and a Belgian woman fall in love during a brief holiday truce amid the Battle of the Bulge

programme.title: Christmas By Candlelight
programme.desc: Wellness expert, Juliet, works on Christmas memory candles with boutique store owner Tom.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: A designer and wealthy heir must team up to bring holiday magic to a small community, making both realize they wish to spend every Christmas together.

programme.title: 12 Dares of Christmas

programme.title: Santa's Castle

programme.desc: An Arkansas drifter is discovered by a radio producer and rises to fame on national television.

programme.title: Green Dolphin Street
programme.desc: In 1840, a man writes a letter to a woman to ask her to be his wife, but mistakenly addresses it to her jealous sister, who wants him for herself.

programme.title: Spirit of St. Louis, The
programme.desc: An aviator risks his life to complete the first solo cross-Atlantic flight.

programme.title: Some Came Running
programme.desc: A hard-drinking ex-GI writer returns to his hometown, stoking incendiary passions that have been building in the small Midwestern community.

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Family tensions boil over when a lonely and fragile Southern belle moves into her sister and brutish brother-in-law's run-down New Orleans home.

programme.title: McCabe and Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: A gambler and a prostitute go into business together in a grimy Western mining town.

programme.title: Hunchback of Notre Dame (1939)
programme.desc: As the Renaissance roils medieval France, the beauty of Esmeralda becomes an uncontrollable lure for four men.
